episodes.title: The Original
episodes.plot: The park staff begin to notice strange behavior from the hosts; A mysterious Man in Black roams the park, wreaking havoc.

episodes.title: Chestnut
episodes.plot: Two guests arrive at the park with different expectations; Maeve's emotions are tweaked; The Man in Black seeks help from a condemned man.

episodes.title: The Stray
episodes.plot: Elsie and Stubbs search for a missing host; Teddy gets a new backstory; Bernard investigates the origins of madness and hallucinations within the hosts.

episodes.title: Dissonance Theory
episodes.plot: Dolores joins William and Logan on a bounty hunt; The Man in Black makes a significant discovery; Ford and Theresa discuss the park's future.

episodes.title: Contrapasso
episodes.plot: Dolores, William and Logan reach Pariah, and are recruited for a dangerous mission; The Man in Black meets an unlikely ally.

episodes.title: The Adversary
episodes.plot: Maeve charms Felix; Elsie discovers evidence that could point to sabotage; Teddy and the Man in Black conflict with a garrison.

episodes.title: Trompe L'Oeil
episodes.plot: Dolores, William and Lawrence journey into treacherous terrain; Maeve presents her demand; Bernard considers his next move.

episodes.title: Trace Decay
episodes.plot: Bernard struggles with a mandate; Teddy is troubled by dark memories; Maeve looks to change her script.

episodes.title: The Well-Tempered Clavier
episodes.plot: Dolores and Bernard reconnect with their pasts; Maeve makes a bold proposition to Hector; Teddy finds enlightenment, at a price.

episodes.title: The Bicameral Mind
episodes.plot: Ford unveils his bold new narrative; Dolores embraces her identity; Maeve sets her plan in motion.
